item.title: Tungsten Carbide (WC) Targets
item.description: Binder-phase WC targets are specifically designed for depositing high-quality and high-purity Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) coatings. They are extensively used in automotive engine components, cutting tools, and surface decoration applications.

item.title: Carbide Cutting Inserts
item.description: Widely used for machining and manufacturing in the automotive, shipbuilding, aerospace, and general equipment industries.

item.title: Metal & Wood Cutting Tools
item.description: Cutting tools are instruments used in machining for material removal.Since most tools in mechanical manufacturing are designed for cutting metal materials, the term ‚Äúcutting tool‚Äù is generally understood to mean metal-cutting tools. Tools specifically for cutting wood are referred to as woodworking tools.

item.title: Wear-Resistant Hard Alloy Components
item.description: Essential for equipment and applications in the machinery, chemical, petroleum, and metallurgical industries.

item.title: Precision Hard Alloy Components
item.description: For applications in oil and gas exploration and drilling, mining excavation, steel production, shipbuilding, petrochemical fittings, chemical processing, pump and valve seals, mechanical parts and accessories, and emerging industries.

item.title: Mining Carbide Alloy Components
item.description: For exploration, extraction, and excavation in various mining operations such as oil, natural gas, coal, and road construction.

item.title: Mining & Excavation Tools
item.description: For applications including mine excavation, tunnel boring, trenching & pile foundation excavation, terrain leveling, building demolition, rock & permafrost excavation, and road milling.

item.title: Profile Products
item.description: Used for cutting and machining in fields such as automotive, energy, aerospace, general machinery, and molds.

item.title: Large-Scale Alloy Parts
item.description: Designed as key components for rolling mills, these parts are applied in the rolling of high-speed wire rods, bars, and small sections.

item.title: Cookie Policy
item.description:
1. What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work efficiently and provide information to site owners.

2. How We Use Cookies

Micro-Precision Carbide uses cookies only for essential functions and to remember your privacy preferences. We do not use cookies for marketing, advertising, or third-party tracking.
